problems_validated.problem: Extracting structured data from long-form media content is extremely difficult
problems_validated.severity: High - described as 'basically impossible' with traditional methods
problems_validated.current_solutions: Breaking down images manually, complex processing steps
problems_validated.market_gap: Requires non-trivial scaffolding work and multiple processing steps

products_tools.name: Google AI Studio
products_tools.use_case: Showcase AI model capabilities, long context processing, media analysis

products_tools.name: Gemma
products_tools.use_case: Open source AI models for developers needing open source solutions

business_strategies.strategy: Create online directories by extracting data from media content
business_strategies.implementation: Use AI Studio to process videos/audio and extract structured information
business_strategies.expected_results: Unlock data trapped in media for directory creation

business_strategies.strategy: Replace complex AI tech stacks with single Google AI Studio solution
business_strategies.implementation: Use free AI Studio instead of building custom scaffolding
business_strategies.case_study: Long context processing without manual breakdown

problems_solutions.problem: Processing long-form video content for data extraction
problems_solutions.solution: Use AI Studio's long context capabilities to process entire videos
problems_solutions.time_estimate: minutes vs hours of manual work

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Extracting insights and structured data from long audio content
startup_ideas.validation: Test with podcast platforms mentioned in transcript
startup_ideas.investment_needed: minimal due to free API access

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Creating comprehensive exhibit databases from video tours
startup_ideas.investment_needed: low startup costs with free AI processing

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not validating AI model outputs for accuracy
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Potential hallucination and incorrect data extraction
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Always validate that extracted information really exists
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Need to verify museum exhibits actually exist in the video

ai_workflows.use_case: Creating directories and databases from video content

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Choose appropriate model based on complexity vs cost trade-offs
